column1: Oh, my pleasure, Sheila. I brought the normal cutting device, but then I remembered that Ike was Canadian, so I brought the right one.  Where is the little rug rat?
There you are. Come on Ike, it's time.
Kyle... a-a circumcision is a very common thing for Ike to have. His father had it, his grandfather had it, and...  his brother had it.
We're not going to cut it off! We're just goin' to snip it, so it looks bigger.
And-a one and-a two and-aâ€¦ bris.
